Name: Anvil Ballista Dunestalker
Description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Anti-Aircraft

Keep your airspace clear of danger with the Anvil Ballista. Originally designed to defend outposts from Vanduul attacks, this mobile missile defense system packs a powerful loadout, allowing the Ballista to stand firm against any threat, whether it arrives by air or land. The Dunestalker variant features a naturalistic paint scheme ideal for blending into harsh landscapes.
